# f5distributedcloud_certificate_chain (Resource)

Manages an F5 XC Certificate Chain resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Certificate Chain.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the Certificate Chain is created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the Certificate Chain.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the Certificate Chain.
